data.title: Black and Blue Lamp
data.meta_description: Black and Blue Lamp - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides a synopsis of a screenplay that begins as a recreation of the 1950 film "The Blue Lamp" but then transforms into a modern police drama called "The Filth", following Tom Riley from his arrest for killing a police officer in 1949 through to the present day where corrupt police officers try to force a confession from him for their own crimes. The screenplay was commissioned by the BBC to push creative boundaries and produce low-budget but high-quality television dramas.
